--- title: 'Predicting Wine Ratings Using Reviews' date: 2023-05-19 description: "Using a mix of quantitative and qualitative data to predict wine ratings globally. This approach demonstrates the utility of text based data in ML models for predicting outcomes of interest. " author: - name: Adam D McKinnon categories: [AI, Text, Wine Reviews] image: "kym-ellis-aF1NPSnDQLw-unsplash.jpg" title-block-banner: true draft: true --- ::: {.cell code_folding='false'} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![[Photo by Kym Ellis on Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/@kymellis).](kym-ellis-aF1NPSnDQLw-unsplash.jpg){width=100%} ::: :::
## Introduction ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # data manipulation library(tidyverse) # modelling library(tidymodels) library(agua) # Processing power library(doParallel) library(parallelly) # Visualisation library(plotly) tidymodels_prefer() ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} original_tbl <- readr::read_csv(file = "winemag-data-2017-2020.csv") |> # clean the variable names janitor::clean_names() ``` ::: Data was downloaded here: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/manyregression/updated-wine-enthusiast-review
